name: Sudoku - 3D Puzzle
description:
This is my first game. I made the regular Sudoku unique and special by adding bright colors for ease of use and 3D graphics.

Ads-free! Free to play!

Use logic to fill the grid so that every column, row, and 3x3 box contains the digits 1-9 once and only once.

feature:

✔ 3D or 2D view

✔ 8 puzzle difficulty levels

✔ Themes - choose the color theme 

 ✔ Ads-free, Free to play
